scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev:multi: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev:1 --prefix frontend" "npm run dev:2 --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && npm install && npm run install:all
